record.name: Set Actual Lead time when task is created

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to evaluate actual_lead_time with planned lead time when task is added
rule.conditionDesc: ( Planned Lead Time in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Planned Lead Time">planned.lead.time</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to evaluate actual_lead_time with planned lead time when task is added (when ( Planned Lead Time in CurrentRecord != NULL))
